includedAssets.title: 28 Days Later
includedAssets.synopsis: Cillian Murphy is the coma victim who wakes up to find that a deliberately leaked virus has turned Britain into a nation of raging zombies. Hooking up with a handful of desperate survivors, Murphy's Jim flees London to seek sanctuary up north. But are they any safer with army major Christopher Eccleston and his paranoid platoon? Nasty surprises spring from every which way in Danny Boyle's splendidly twitchy apocalyptic horror. The surprises even keep coming after the end credits with an alternative ending that Boyle and writer Alex Garland are equally proud of.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Chaos reigns when a virus starts turning humans into blood-crazed predators. An alternate ending follows the film.

includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, violence

includedAssets.title: 28 Weeks Later
includedAssets.synopsis: Six months after the 'rage' virus first poured onto the streets of London, a NATO force has managed to contain the outbreak. Secured by the US Army, an uninfected area has been established on London's Isle of Dogs... but has the zombigenic biohazard really been stamped out? Robert Carlyle tests his resistance as Spanish director Juan Carlos Fresnadillo plunders the blood banks for the flesh-crawling sequel to 28 Days Later...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The US army flies in to reboot a destroyed London, but those still infected with the Rage Virus have other plans.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Six months after the 'rage' virus first poured onto the streets of London, a NATO force has managed to contain the outbreak. Robert Carlyle tests his resistance as Spanish director Juan Carlos Fresnadillo plunders the blood banks for the flesh-crawling sequel to 28 Days Later...

includedAssets.title: 28 Days Later Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: 28 days after a group of activists unwittingly unleash a deadly virus, Cillian Murphy fights for his life as the UK descends into bloody chaos. 28 weeks later, the US army attempts to rescue the uninfected and rebuild London. Modern horror classic from Danny Boyle (Slumdog Millionaire) and Alex Garland (Ex Machina) and its sequel starring Robert Carlyle, Idris Elba and Jeremy Renner.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Cillian Murphy fights for his life after a virus plunges the UK into chaos. Horror classic from Danny Boyle and its sequel starring Jeremy Renner.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: 28 days after a group of activists unwittingly unleash a deadly virus, Cillian Murphy fights for his life as the UK descends into bloody chaos. 28 weeks later, the US army attempts to rescue the uninfected and rebuild London. Modern horror classic from Danny Boyle (Slumdog Millionaire) and Alex Garland (Ex Machina) and its sequel starring Robert Carlyle, Idris Elba and Jeremy Renner.

includedIn.title: 28 Days Later
includedIn.synopsis: 28 days after a group of activists unwittingly unleash a deadly virus, a man wakes up alone in an empty hospital and must fight for his life as the UK descends into bloody chaos. 28 weeks later, the US army attempts to rescue the uninfected and rebuild London
